word:
Chap. 17 - Safeguarding the New Experience
-

              The Contest Following the Revival 

     [IN 1893 THERE WAS A MARKED REVIVAL IN OUR INSTITUTIONS AT OUR BATTLE CREEK HEADQUARTERS, WITH LARGE EVIDENCE OF THE WORK OF THE SPIRIT OF GOD. MUCH OF THE BLESSING WAS LOST IN EVENTS WHICH FOLLOWED IN QUICK SUCCESSION. IN THIS EXPERIENCE AND THE COUNSEL GIVEN IN CONNECTION WITH IT MAY BE FOUND LESSONS WHICH ARE OF VALUE TODAY.--COMPILERS.]
